InstructionData.Title: Setting Mirror
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: # Setting Mirror​ # Model: SM-100​ # Mirror Setting var for up to 3 devices​ alias master r0​ alias mirror r1​ alias pair r2​ alias setting r3​ alias t0 r10​ start:​ yield​ move pair 0​ loop:​ slt t0 pair 3​ blez t0 start # no more device pairs​ move master pair # master device​ bdns dr0 increment​ add mirror master 3 # mirrored de​ bdns dr1 increment​ l setting dr0 Setting # read Setting​ s dr1 Setting setting # write Setting​ increment:​ add pair pair 1 # increment device pair​ j loop
